pageContext.content:
If you’re a digital publisher, engaging with your audience is critical. According to OpenWeb data, users who actively contribute to a publisher’s community spend 15x longer on site and are 71% more likely to come back for more content.

Watch our webinar with the Director of Community for Salon.com to learn how their editorial team has used OpenWeb’s Live Blog and automated moderation tools to spark dialogue and encourage civility in an increasingly heated political environment.
